comment:
* A data object representing an admin's request to control a certain permission
 * for a certain app.
 * This class is processed by the Permission Controller's
 * setRuntimePermissionGrantStateByDeviceAdmin method.
 *
 * @hide

variables.name: mGranteePackageName
variables.comment: The package to grant/deny the permission to.

variables.name: mCanAdminGrantSensorsPermissions
variables.comment: Whether the admin can grant sensors-related permissions.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)
public String getGranteePackageName()
methods.comment: Returns the name of the package the permission applies to

methods.name: public boolean canAdminGrantSensorsPermissions()
methods.comment: * return true if the admin may control grants of permissions related to sensors.

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)
